title: "Maintenance: [Task Description]"

---

# Maintenance Guidelines
Thank you for submitting this maintenance task! Please include:

1. **Task Description**: What needs to be done (e.g., "Update dependencies to latest versions", "Refactor authentication module").
2. **Reason**: Why this task is necessary (e.g., "Security vulnerabilities in old dependencies", "Improve code readability").
3. **Scope**: Which parts of the codebase are affected.
4. **Proposed Timeline**: Estimated time to complete (if known).
